sendIntermediateResult(android.os.Bundle.Description: Report an intermediate result of the request, without completing it (the request is still active and the app is waiting for the final result), resulting in a call to @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#CommandRequest#onCommandResult_E@ with false for isCompleted.

getCommand().Description: Return the command that is being executed, as per @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#CommandRequest_E@.

sendResult(android.os.Bundle).Description: Report the final result of the request, completing the request and resulting in a call to @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#CommandRequest#onCommandResult_E@ with true for isCompleted. This finishes the request (it is no longer active).

ClassDesc: A generic vendor-specific request, as per @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#CommandRequest_E@.
